meanings: (겁을 먹다) be frightened, be terrified, (핏기가 가시다) turn[go] pale
(싫증이 나다) be sick of, (informal) be fed up with, (S) be sick and tired of

vlive.korean: 형이 나중에는 질려서 '너 혼자 갔다 와' 이러더라고. Obu got sick of it and told me to go on my own. 듣기 View video B1A4 : B1A4의 To My Star EP.013-2
vlive.english: Obu got sick of it and told me to go on my own.

vlive.korean: 하얀색 머리가 질려서 염색했는데. I was sick of the white hair. 듣기 View video iKON : 심심한 하루
vlive.english: I was sick of the white hair.

vlive.korean: 형원 군도 이제 겁에 질려서. - 네. Because Hyungwon was also scared. - Yes. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 민혁이와 주헌이의 B RADIO IN TOKYO 🐶🐝❤
vlive.english: Because Hyungwon was also scared. - Yes.

vlive.korean: 전 먹어도 먹어도 안 질려서 두부가 잘 맞고... I like to eat tofu to lose weight. 듣기 View video YGK+ : 효니티비4 손담비랑 제주올래? with Dambi Son
vlive.english: I like to eat tofu to lose weight.

vlive.korean: 쓰다가 또 질려서 안 쓴 적도 있거든요. sometimes I get tired it and stop using it. 듣기 View video HANABONO : 수부지 피부 뒤집힌날 응급 스킨케어 딱 세가지만!
vlive.english: sometimes I get tired it and stop using it.

examples.korean: I’m fed up with living with my parents, so I’m looking for a place of my own. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 부모님과 함께 사는 데 질려서 나 혼자 살 곳을 알아보고 있어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m fed up with living with my parents, so I’m looking for a place of my own. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was so frightened[scared; terrified] that he ran away. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 겁에 질려서 도망갔다 Neungyule
examples.english: He was so frightened[scared; terrified] that he ran away. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The frightened girl drew near her mother. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 여자아이는 겁에 질려서 엄마에게 다가갔다. Neungyule
examples.english: The frightened girl drew near her mother. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: When his father is present, he loses his nerve and cannot say a word. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 아버지 앞에서는 기가 질려서 말 한 마디 못한다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: When his father is present, he loses his nerve and cannot say a word. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: On the way back from the assembly point, where he had gotten some great shots of a marine confronting a Vietnamese mother and her little boy, he photographed many panicking Vietnamese in the streets burning papers that could identify them as having had ties to the United States. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 집결지로부터 다시 돌아오는 길에 그는 아이를 동반한 베트남 여인과 대치하고 있는 해병의 사진을 찍었고 겁에 질려서 미군과의 관계를 보여주는 자료들을 길에서 태우는 베트남인들을 찍었다. Neungyule
examples.english: On the way back from the assembly point, where he had gotten some great shots of a marine confronting a Vietnamese mother and her little boy, he photographed many panicking Vietnamese in the streets burning papers that could identify them as having had ties to the United States. Add to Wordbook
